item.title: Evolution of web development
item.description: The Evolution of a programmer joke exists for many different languages. I think there’s also room here for evolution of a web developer. I grew up making websites during the Web 1.0 era for fun, began developing professionally in the 2010s, and have been doing mostly web stuff ever since. It’s 2023 now, so I’ve been twiddling with HTML for over 20 years at this point.
